---

## Summary
Describe the feature or enhancement you would like to see.

## Motivation
Why is this feature useful?  
What problem does it solve or what scenario does it help?

## Proposed Changes
Describe how this feature could be implemented. High-level ideas are enough.

Examples:
- Add a new playbook for ...
- Extend existing variables to support ...
- Improve documentation for ...

## Impact
Who will benefit from this feature? (e.g. all students, specific labs, etc.)

## Additional Context
Add any links, references, or examples that help explain the idea.
